files.description:
A map of file names to JSON template bodies. File names are
provider resource templates, as referenced in the environment.

disable_rollback.description:
Enables or disables deletion of all previously-created stack
resources when stack creation fails. Set to ``True`` to keep all
previously-created stack resources when stack creation fails. Set
to ``False`` to delete all previously-created stack resources when
stack creation fails. Default is ``True`` .

links.description: A list of URLs for the stack.

param_name-n.description: User-defined parameter names to pass to the template.

stack_id.description: The system-assigned ID for the stack.

environment.description: A JSON environment for the stack.

stack_name.description: The name of the stack to create.

rel.description:
A reference to the stack's parent. If no parent, reference is
``self`` .

timeout_mins.description: The timeout for stack creation in minutes.

param_value-n.description: User-defined parameter values to pass to the template.
